thread.section_title: Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Coffee could be a lot better
thread.title_full: Coffee could be a lot better - Review of Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: 722kerris
title: Coffee could be a lot better
text: The room was very clean and well-appointed. They are doing some remodeling at this time, March 2017, but the noise was minimal. Free airport shuttle every 30 minutes, so we used that to connect with BART for sightseeing excursions in the city. Only real complaint is the coffee was not very good; what we brewed in the room tasted better. Other breakfast items were fine.
